title: G-Drive ArmorATD hard drive review: Style, toughness, and low cost per gigabyte
content: Hard drives aren’t sexy and they aren’t particularly fast, but they do offer a whole lot of storage space for a lot less cash per gigabyte than SSDs. Their Achilles heel is reliability, but with a little toughening up—as SanDisk has done with the G-Drive ArmorATD—they can withstand relatively severe rigors. The ArmorATD is an […]
